passages.text:
Ah, you again! I have great news! I've made progress since I last saw you. Well, a small amount of progress, but progress nonetheless.
[[Continue]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
The priestess has agreed to allow me to witness The Choosing! And on top of that, I've been given permission to TAKE NOTES! How exciting is that?
[[What's "The Choosing?"|What choosing]]
passages.name: Continue

passages.text:
I have no idea! But yesterday, I didn't even know there WAS a Choosing, so this is quite an exciting development.
[[Continue2]]
passages.name: What choosing

passages.text:
Now, I've noticed you talking to a lot of the townspeople. Have you gotten any hints about what this ritual might entail? Do you have any theories?
[[Maybe it's a courting ritual.|Courting]]
[[It could be some type of competition.|Competition]]
[[I have no idea.|No idea]]

links.name: It could be some type of competition.|Competition
links.link: It could be some type of competition.|Competition

passages.name: Continue2

passages.text:
That's certainly an interesting thought... This is a rather small community, so they likely have some traditions that insure their family trees don't get their roots tangled... But of course, this is just speculation. The Choosing could be anything!
[[Bye]]
passages.name: Courting

passages.text:
Hmm, that's certainly a possibility... Maybe it's similar to the Highland Games of Scotland? But of course, this is just speculation. It could be anything!
[[Bye]]
passages.name: Competition

passages.text:
Hmm... Well, personally, I think it could be some sort of crowning ceremony, like the Summer Queen traditions of medieval England. But of course, this is just speculation. It could be anything!
[[Bye]]
passages.name: No idea

passages.text: Well, let me know if you come across any more information. I certainly appreciate your help.
passages.name: Bye
